content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava. Can I get your first name, please?
Nice to meet you, Karen! Could you please provide the address where you need service?
Thank you! Could you briefly describe the electrical issue you are having, so our technician knows what to expect?

Uh, well I think it's like... the thing. The lights. It's not really working like it used to. I mean, sometimes it flickers? Or maybe it's the outlet. Or the thingy in the basement? I'm not sure, sorry.
Thank you for sharing. Could you please clarify if it’s just a single light or outlet, or are multiple areas having issues? Any additional details will help us assist you better.
Honestly, I don’t really know. I just want someone to check everything. I keep getting confused when I try to explain.
Thank you, Karen. I’m having some trouble capturing the specifics of the issue. Let me get a team member to assist you further. One moment, please.
reason: Unable to collect sufficient job description to proceed.

content: Hi Karen, this is Angela with XYZ Home Services. No worries about the details—we can have our technician do a full electrical checkup of your home. Would you prefer a morning or afternoon appointment?
